subtitle: greetings my beloved friends I am Mera
of the pleadian High
Council as we witness from our higher
perspective we see the great split a
cosmic Divergence of timelines that is
now
accelerating this split represents the
separation of positive and negative
timelines a shift that will become
increasing evident over the next 24
months yes indeed the energies swirling
across earth are intense filled with
fear uncertainty and a sense of
impending change for
many environmental upheavals societal
unrest and the unknown future are
testing the resilience of your spirit
and the fortitude of your light for
those of you sensitive to the collective
energy this period is particularly
challenging your lower chakras the
centers of grounding creativity and
personal power are absorbing these
energies potentially leading to feelings
of
disconnection and a dimming of Your
Inner
Light but know this dear ones this is
not a time to retreat or dim your
light this is a call to rise to stand
firm in your your mission and to Anchor
the highest frequencies of love and
unity the great split is not a cause for
fear but an opportunity to choose your
path
consciously will you align with the
timeline of love unity and higher
Consciousness or will you allow yourself
to be pulled into the lower vibrations
of fear and
division to assist you during this
important phase we offer a technique to
cleanse your energy field realign your
chakras and reinforce your connection to
both Earth and the
cosmos this practice will help you
anchor into the positive timeline and
strengthen your role as a bearer of
[Music]
light Begin by finding a quiet space

deep cleansing
breaths with each inhale Envision pure
crystalline light descending from the
cosmos entering through your crown
chakra and filling your entire being as
you exhale imagine releasing all fear
anxiety and lower
vibrations grounding them into the Earth
where they are transmuted into love and
clarity
focus on your root chakra at the base of
your spine visualize a vibrant red light
growing stronger with each breath
anchoring you deeply to the
Earth feel this connection stabilizing
you providing a solid foundation of
security and Trust now incorporate sound
to enhance the cleansing process on each
exhale use a long sustained tone of the
sound
oh this vibration will break up and
release stagnant energies facilitating a
deep purification and
[Music]
realignment as you continue this sound
place your hands on your heart feel the

yourself I am grounded I am clear I am a
vessel of light and
love I am allowing the Creator's love to
flow through me now to all the
